item.title: Turkish Red Lentil Soup
item.description: Serve with a squeeze of lemon and alongside turmeric flatbread. â²ï¸ Prep time: 10 min ğŸ³ Cook time: 30 min ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6 Ingredients 1 cup Red Lentils 5 Tbsp Olive Oil 1 Tbsp Paprika 1/2 Tbsp Red Paper Flakes 1 large Onion, finely diced 1 large Carrot, diced 4 tsp Tomato Paste 2 tsp Cumin 1/2 tsp Dried Mint 1/2 tsp Thyme or Oregano 4 cup Vegetable Broth 4 cup Water Directions Reserve half the paprika and red pepper flakes, set aside.

item.title: Lenten Lentil Curry
item.description: Simple green lentil recipe. Suitable for Lent.
